languages.text: "Зази тоже знахарка! И помогает людям улья намного больше, чем чистоплюи с официальными грамотами хирургеонов! Я не желаю, как ты, вести праздную жизнь в шпилях Даргонуса, зная о тысячах несчастных уровнями ниже, нуждающихся в моей помощи!"

traits.locale_text: "Зази тоже знахарка! И помогает людям улья намного больше, чем чистоплюи с официальными грамотами хирургеонов! Я не желаю, как ты, вести праздную жизнь в шпилях Даргонуса, зная о тысячах несчастных уровнями ниже, нуждающихся в моей помощи!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: "Zazi is a healer too! And she helps the people of the hive a great deal more than any lily-white chirurgeon with a diploma! I do not want to live a life of idleness in the spires of Dargonus like you, not when I know there are thousands of unfortunate people in the lower levels who need my help!"
languages.original_text: "Зази тоже знахарка! И помогает людям улья намного больше, чем чистоплюи с официальными грамотами хирургеонов! Я не желаю, как ты, вести праздную жизнь в шпилях Даргонуса, зная о тысячах несчастных уровнями ниже, нуждающихся в моей помощи!"

I do not want to live a life of idleness in the spires of Dargonus like you, not when I know there are thousands of unfortunate people in the lower levels who need my help!"

I do not want to live a life of idleness in the spires of Dargonus like you, not when I know there are thousands of unfortunate people in the lower levels who need my help!"

I do not want to live a life of idleness in the spires of Dargonus like you, not when I know there are thousands of unfortunate people in the lower levels who need my help!"

traits.locale_text: "Zazi is a healer too! And she helps the people of the hive a great deal more than any lily-white chirurgeon with a diploma! I do not want to live a life of idleness in the spires of Dargonus like you, not when I know there are thousands of unfortunate people in the lower levels who need my help!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: “萨姿也同样是治疗师！她帮助过许多巢都民众，比那些拿着文凭的花哨医生救治的人要多得多！我可不想像你一样，一辈子活在达戈努斯的尖塔里，过着百无聊赖的人生。既然我已经知道，巢都底层有成百上千不幸的民众需要我来救助，那我就更不能这么做了！”
languages.original_text: "Zazi is a healer too! And she helps the people of the hive a great deal more than any lily-white chirurgeon with a diploma! I do not want to live a life of idleness in the spires of Dargonus like you, not when I know there are thousands of unfortunate people in the lower levels who need my help!"

traits.locale_text: “萨姿也同样是治疗师！她帮助过许多巢都民众，比那些拿着文凭的花哨医生救治的人要多得多！我可不想像你一样，一辈子活在达戈努斯的尖塔里，过着百无聊赖的人生。既然我已经知道，巢都底层有成百上千不幸的民众需要我来救助，那我就更不能这么做了！”
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: «¡Zazi también es curandera! ¡Y ayuda a la gente de esta colmena mucho más que ningún cirujano de punta en blanco con un diploma! ¡No pienso vivir una vida de desidia en las agujas de Dargonus como tú cuando sé que hay miles de personas desfavorecidas en los niveles inferiores que necesitan mi ayuda!».
languages.original_text: "Zazi is a healer too! And she helps the people of the hive a great deal more than any lily-white chirurgeon with a diploma! I do not want to live a life of idleness in the spires of Dargonus like you, not when I know there are thousands of unfortunate people in the lower levels who need my help!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Zazi también es curandera! ¡Y ayuda a la gente de esta colmena mucho más que ningún cirujano de punta en blanco con un diploma! ¡No pienso vivir una vida de desidia en las agujas de Dargonus como tú cuando sé que hay miles de personas desfavorecidas en los niveles inferiores que necesitan mi ayuda!».
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: 「ザジも治療師だ！彼女はハイヴの住民にとって大きな助けとなれる、学位をとったばかりの外科医よりもずっと！僕は母さんのようにダルゴナスの尖塔で退屈な人生を送りたくはない、不幸な下層の人々が何千人と、僕の力を必要としてるんだ！」
languages.original_text: "Zazi is a healer too! And she helps the people of the hive a great deal more than any lily-white chirurgeon with a diploma! I do not want to live a life of idleness in the spires of Dargonus like you, not when I know there are thousands of unfortunate people in the lower levels who need my help!"

traits.locale_text: 「ザジも治療師だ！彼女はハイヴの住民にとって大きな助けとなれる、学位をとったばかりの外科医よりもずっと！僕は母さんのようにダルゴナスの尖塔で退屈な人生を送りたくはない、不幸な下層の人々が何千人と、僕の力を必要としてるんだ！」
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: « Zazi aussi est guérisseuse ! Et elle est bien plus utile aux habitants de la ruche que ces chirurgeons en blouse blanche bardés de diplômes ! Je refuse de mener comme vous une vie d'oisiveté à l'abri des tours de Dargonus alors que des milliers de miséreux ont besoin de mon aide dans les niveaux inférieurs ! »
languages.original_text: "Zazi is a healer too! And she helps the people of the hive a great deal more than any lily-white chirurgeon with a diploma! I do not want to live a life of idleness in the spires of Dargonus like you, not when I know there are thousands of unfortunate people in the lower levels who need my help!"

traits.locale_text: « Zazi aussi est guérisseuse ! Et elle est bien plus utile aux habitants de la ruche que ces chirurgeons en blouse blanche bardés de diplômes ! Je refuse de mener comme vous une vie d'oisiveté à l'abri des tours de Dargonus alors que des milliers de miséreux ont besoin de mon aide dans les niveaux inférieurs ! »
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: "Zazi ist auch eine Heilerin! Und sie hilft den Menschen der Makropole viel mehr als irgendein diplomierter Chirurgeum im weißen Kittel! Ich will nicht wie Ihr ein untätiges Leben in den Türmen von Dargonus führen, nicht solange Tausende von unglücklichen Menschen in den unteren Ebenen meine Hilfe brauchen!"
languages.original_text: "Zazi is a healer too! And she helps the people of the hive a great deal more than any lily-white chirurgeon with a diploma! I do not want to live a life of idleness in the spires of Dargonus like you, not when I know there are thousands of unfortunate people in the lower levels who need my help!"

traits.locale_text: "Zazi ist auch eine Heilerin! Und sie hilft den Menschen der Makropole viel mehr als irgendein diplomierter Chirurgeum im weißen Kittel! Ich will nicht wie Ihr ein untätiges Leben in den Türmen von Dargonus führen, nicht solange Tausende von unglücklichen Menschen in den unteren Ebenen meine Hilfe brauchen!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumYoungWorker

languages.text: "Zazi de şifacı! Zazi, kovandaki insanlara diplomalı ve kalbi temiz tüm cerrahlardan çok daha fazla yardım ediyor! Alt seviyelerde yardımıma ihtiyacı olan binlerce talihsiz insan olduğunu bile bile senin gibi Dargonus kulelerinde aylak bir yaşam sürdürmek istemiyorum!"
languages.original_text: "Zazi is a healer too! And she helps the people of the hive a great deal more than any lily-white chirurgeon with a diploma! I do not want to live a life of idleness in the spires of Dargonus like you, not when I know there are thousands of unfortunate people in the lower levels who need my help!"
